approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This process is manual and time-consuming.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All recordings of V-KYC shall be available on this portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date and month wise.
An option for users to upload an Excel or text file with LAN IDs should be available.
The system should process the uploaded file and trigger a call to backend API.
Results should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should have pagination to display only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records should be downloaded at a time.
The file for upload should be a CSV/TXT file.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: Access to V-KYC recordings via a portal/dashboard.
Filtering and sorting by date and month.
Bulk download option via file upload (CSV/TXT).
Display of results in a tabular format with pagination.
non_functional_requirements: Access to the portal restricted to Team Leaders.
success_criteria: V-KYC recordings are easily accessible by authorized users.
Reduced dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload limited to 50 LAN IDs.
assumptions: The backend API for processing requests exists or will be developed.

recommendations: Specify the security measures for accessing the portal.
Define the performance requirements for the portal, especially for bulk downloads.
Detail the error handling and logging mechanisms.

identified_gaps: Error handling and logging details are missing.
recommendations_for_completion: Define security protocols for user authentication and data access.
Specify performance metrics, such as response times and download speeds.
Detail the error handling and logging mechanisms.
